page.title: 11CANOEING AT PONTSTICILL
page.content: Dolygaer Outdoor Pursuits Centre also offers the sport of canoeing on Ponsticill Reservoir.While I was in Dolygaer I had the chance to go canoeing on the reservoir.I was glad that I went canoeing on the reservoir because some of my friends went canoeing on the canal and they said that it was very muddy.When we got down to the equipment store we were given life jackets,we were then given a canoe each.Then our instructor showed us how to use the paddle corr_ ectly.Once we could all paddle he showed us how to make a raft.Once we had done that we had to go on the back of somebody elses canoe.I was wondering how it would come in useful when you are canoeing,and he said that if you capsize out at sea and your boat is full of water then you will not have to wait to be rescued.
